Pictures of NPCs Leaf Falldim and Gandari

Leaf Falldim and Gandari can both be found at the Ranger's Guild in Kithicor's Forest.

Leaf Falldim

Leaf Falldim gives the Quests for the Etched Ivy Boots, Gauntlets, and Leggings. He can be found standing outside of the Ranger Guild next to a tree. Telling Leaf Falldim "I want to earn the ivy etched XXXXX ." are key phrases to start the Etched Ivy Armor Quests

Gandari

Gandari gives the Quests for the Etched Ivy Bracers, Helm, Sleeves, and Tunic. Gandari can be found in the back room of one O the Ranger Guild Houses.

Key Phrases
You say, 'Hail, Gandari'
Gandari says 'Most call me Gandari the Terse. You here for [ivy armor]?
You say, 'what Ivy armor?'
Gandari says 'I reward brave rangers with ivy etched armor - [helm]s, [tunic]s, [sleeves] and [bracers]. [Interested]?
You say, 'interested in XXXXXX.'
